SectionBody.Text: This joint resolution applies with respect to the qualification, nomination, and election of members of the Florida House of Representatives in the primary and general elections to be held in 2002 and thereafter.

Note.Text: Superseded by s. 10.18, created by s. 8, Committee Substitute for Senate Joint Resolution 1176, 2012 Regular Session, and s. 10.181, created by s. 3, Committee Substitute for Senate Joint Resolution 2-B, 2012 Special Session B.
